name: Snow Sniper Shooting
description:
Aim !
Hold your breath !
and
Shoot at your target to get rid of deadly enemies .
Snow Sniper Shooting is about precision , accuracy and skill . You are trained as a Army commando soldier and shoot the enemies soldiers .
All of this starts after enemies attack on our cities and capturing some of our hotspots . Enemies success was due to surprise attack in the real cold weather and sniper 3d shooter . After holding their attack our headquarter launched similar sniper shot operation along with the real war to unleash the enemies main hold.
Be the best sniper shooter by sniper shooting the enemies army soldier . Don't underestimate the power and skill of enemies army . You are save until you haven't shoot any of their soldier . In case you shot any of their soldier they will start heavy fire upon you . So you have to be very fast.
*** Main Features ***
* A lot of different Sniper 3d weapons
* Different Environment like mountains , city etc
* Best sniper simulation controls
* FREE game: play it both on your phone and tablet
* ADDICTING gameplay (FPS)
* Lots of addictive missions
* Real sound effects for enjoying real sniper 3d games
* Best sniper shooting experience you ever have
